about_the_game:
Are your clients treating you too well? Do you think you deserve less praise, and much more pettiness? The Miserable Artist Experience DLC is here to fix that for you.

Discover a fresh take on the game’s story, and experience the life of a not-so-genius artist, after all.

Start a new game to enable the Miserable Artist experience. You can later disable it mid-game if you wish to. As for now, this alternative experience is only available in English.
detailed_description:
Are your clients treating you too well? Do you think you deserve less praise, and much more pettiness? The Miserable Artist Experience DLC is here to fix that for you.

Discover a fresh take on the game’s story, and experience the life of a not-so-genius artist, after all.

Start a new game to enable the Miserable Artist experience. You can later disable it mid-game if you wish to. As for now, this alternative experience is only available in English.
name: SuchArt - Miserable Artist Experience
